page.title: 11MY NEIGHBOUR THE FARMER
page.content: On a farm there are lots of Animals. There are pigs and Horses in the field, and cows and bulls. Most of the cows are either frrisians or charolets. At night and in the morning, the cows get milked. There are also some hens At the Farm up the road from where I Live. He is a nice farmer, sometimes he has a scramble for the motor bikes on some of his waste land. He grows mushrooms and you can pick them. The farmer has four dogs. sometimes he Lets us children go up to see his calves and lambs and foals.
